entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
